mathematica: balTernDigits[0] := {0}; balTernDigits[n_/;n > 0] := Module[{unParsed = n, currRem, currExp = 1, digitList = {}, nextDigit}, While[unParsed > 0, If[unParsed == 3^(currExp - 1), digitList = Append[digitList, 1]; unParsed = 0, currRem = Mod[unParsed, 3^currExp]/3^(currExp - 1); nextDigit = Switch[currRem, 0, 0, 2, -1, 1, 1]; digitList = Append[digitList, nextDigit]; unParsed = unParsed - nextDigit * 3^(currExp - 1)]; currExp++]; digitList = Reverse[digitList]; Return[digitList]]; balTernDigits[n_/;n < 0] := (-1)balTernDigits[Abs[n]]; Table[Plus@@balTernDigits[n], {n, 0, 108}] (* _Alonso del Arte_, Feb 25 2011 *)

terVal[lst_List] := Reverse[lst].(3^Range[0, Length[lst] - 1]); maxDig = 4; t = Table[0, {3 * 3^maxDig/2}]; t[[1]] = 1; Do[d = IntegerDigits[Range[0, 3^dig - 1], 3, dig]/.{2 -> -1}; d = Prepend[#, 1]&/@d; t[[terVal/@d]] = Total/@d, {dig, maxDig}]; Prepend[t, 0] (* _T. D. Noe_, Feb 24 2011 *)
Array[Total[Prepend[IntegerDigits[#, 3], 0] //. {a___, b_, 2, c___} :> {a, b + 1, -1, c}] &, 109, 0] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 27 2020 *)
